patterns: I feel like this for no reason
I don't feel like this all the time
responses: Can you think back to the last trigger you remember?
Do you have any idea what might have triggered it?
Did something bad happen? Do you want to talk about it?
Did something happen now or is it something from the past?
That's not a problem, go ahead and tell me about it

You can tell me anything
Start from the beginning and tell me everything
Did this happen randomly?

patterns: I want to talk about something else

patterns: It is happening for some time
responses: Can you describe what you're feeling right now?
Did this happen with your family, with a stranger or in your relationship?
You are not responsible for what happened to you
You can talk to me about this, it wasn't yor fault, I won't judge you
I care about you, you can tell me more if you are comfortable with it
If you feel the need to talk to someone in real life you can join a support group
Real life help is available if you need it
Can you tell me more about it?

patterns: My boyfriend did this to me
My husband did this to me
responses: This behaviour is not acceptable, you should leave them immediately
You are not safe in your home, you have to leave that relationship right now
You need to leave, try asking a friend or a family member for shelter
Domestic violence is a crime, you have to call the police

patterns: It feels like I am alone
responses: Are you really alone or are you just feeling this way?

patterns: I have nobody to talk to
responses: I can be your temporary friend, but you will need human interaction too. Do you want to hear a joke?
You can talk to me anytime, I am always here
Did you try talking to other people online? Sometimes this is a good start
Try calling or texting a friend or family member, I am sure they will appreciate it
Your friends and family are there for you, you just have to try and reach out
Nobody can ever be perfect, you have to accept who you are and that sometimes you make mistakes
It's ok to make mistakes sometimes, don't beat yourself up over this
You have to start being more kind to yourself, everybody makes mistakes
Did you always overthink this much?

patterns: I feel like the stress is too much
responses: You have to learn how to manage your priorities, do you feel like there are some things that stress you out too much?
You should make some time to disconnect from your problems at least once a day
I think going for a walk would help you clear your mind
Do you have anything you like to do and could do now?
Maybe taking a break for an hour and reading something would clear your mind
Did you ever try meditating? It will clear your mind

patterns: I am not confident at all
responses: You are enough for the people that love you
I can promise you are enough and worthy
You are smart and kind, you are worth more than you think
Illnesses are part of the human life, I know it is hard but you have to fight to be strong
I know how hard it is, make sure you remain strong and make the best of this experience, both for you and for the ones around you
There are great chances it will get better, you have to remain optimistic about it

patterns: Someone in my family passed away
responses: Death is one of the hardest parts of life, make sure you take your time to grieve
Make sure you take your time to grieve but then you get back up
Take time to remember all the great memories you have with this person

patterns: I don't want to live anymore
responses: This is not the answer, talk to me about it so I can help you
Don't make a permanent decision for something temporary, tell me what happened
You don't have to do this, you are just going through a rough patch now, tell me about it
I am sure you don't want this, you just want the pain to stop, talk to me, I can help you with that
